abstract: Denmark national soccer team defeats United States, 3-2, in exhibition game; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Bendtner scored his first international hat trick, taking advantage of an American defense that gave up two more late goals, and Denmark rallied to beat the United States, 3-2, in an exhibition game at Aarhus on Wednesday night.
snippet: Nicklas Bendtner scored his first international hat trick, taking advantage of an American defense that gave up two more late goals, and Denmark rallied to beat the United States, 3-2, in an exhibition game at Aarhus on Wednesday night.
